list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: either of the two fleshy parts which form the upper and lower edges of the opening of the mouth.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he kissed her on the lips

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the edge of a hollow container or an opening.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: drawing her finger around the lip of the cup

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: don't give me any of your lip!
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đừng cho tôi bất kỳ môi của bạn!
